title: Enough Already! Can We Get A Straight Answer About This Swing State? (Ep 1415)
description:
In this episode, I discuss the stunning allegations about Election Day troubles in this key swing state, as revealed in a new court finding. I also discuss the latest in a long list of examples of Trump defying media expectations. 

News Picks:

Auditors find an astonishing 68 percent error rate in the election. 

Wisconsin Supreme Court says election officials were wrong, ballots may not be counted. 

Some electors in contested states casted votes for Trump.

The ridiculous media meltdown over the Jill Biden incident.  


Media zero tries to take a cheap shot at Trump’s economic record, and quickly gets shredded. 

The media is already busy crediting Biden for Trump’s accomplishments. 


Bill Barr is out at DOJ.

The media owes Dr. Gorka an apology.
